lead_paragraph: Global soccer body FIFA's ethics watchdog opened formal proceedings against former German football official Helmut Sandrock on Wednesday after its investigatory chamber recommended he perform social work and pay a 50,000 Swiss franc ($51,652.89) fine for conduct related to the 2006 World Cup.

headline.print_headline: FIFA Watchdog Recommends 50,000 Swiss Francs Fine for Germany's Sandrock
headline.main: FIFA Watchdog Recommends 50,000 Swiss Francs Fine for Germany's Sandrock
